nodes.text: Gol was a human male who sold technology from a stall in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. He was abusive and xenophobic towards his Chadra-Fan assistant Kriki. After the Resistance spy Vi Moradi rescued Kriki from Gol's abuse, he reported her to First Order Lieutenant Wulfgar Kath. Gol was shot and killed by Zade Kalliday after he went to watch Kath interrogate Moradi.
